mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPT USING (DEPT_CODE) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) ORDER BY JOB_CODE

SELECT EMP_NAME, EMP_PHONE, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_DESKPHONE, EMP_FILE_PATH , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) DEPT_NAME , (SELECT JOB_TITLE FROM JOB JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) JOB_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT EMP_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) DEPT_NAME , (SELECT JOB_TITLE FROM JOB JOIN EMPLOYEE USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) JOB_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
SELECT MAX(DF_NO) DF_NO FROM DOCUMENT_FORM WHERE DF_CODE = #{df_code}

SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_PHONE, (SELECT JOB_TITLE FROM JOB JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) JOB_TITLE, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}) DEPT_NAME, (SELECT TO_CHAR(EAP_DRAFT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL WHERE EAP_NO = (SELECT MAX(EAP_NO) FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL)) EAP_DRAFT_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT (C.EMP_HO_CR_CNT - NVL(AA.HO_USE_COUNT,0)) AS 잔여일수 FROM EMPLOYEE C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.EMP_NO, SUM(HO_USE_COUNT) AS HO_USE_COUNT FROM ELECTRONIC_APPROVAL A, HOLIDAY B WHERE A.EAP_STA_CODE = 'F' AND B.DF_NO = A.DF_NO GROUP BY A.EMP_NO) AA ON C.EMP_NO = AA.EMP_NO WHERE C.EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
